```{r Setup, include=FALSE, results="hide", warning=FALSE}
opts_chunk$set(dev=c("png"),
               fig.width=14,
               fig.height=7,
               dpi=300)

hook_plot_md_martin <- function(x,options) {
    sprintf("![%s](%s){#%s%s}", options$fig.cap, knitr:::.upload.url(x), options$fig.lp, options$label)
}

knit_hooks$set(plot = hook_plot_md_martin)
```
